website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option if you only have one or two guns that need hanging.
pros: Tough metal hooks that blend in with any decor
Can accommodate rifles and shotguns of all sizes
cons: Some have said that the foam lining is inconsistent from one hook to the next

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA! What a joke!
customer_reviews.text: This gun rack is very poorly made. One of the hooks was bent, and I had to bend it straight myself. The padding on both hooks were put on so bad they were sticking off the side. Also this rack isn't very universal. I hung my grandfathers model 37 windchester, and the hooks are so big it just flops over making it look like a joke. Don't waste you're money on this. I thought that since it was made in the USA it may be of better quality... But no, China's the way to go apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Dill Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Easy and affordable way to hang stuff
customer_reviews.text: You can make these yourself for about the same price. However, if you don't want the hassle these are an easy option. Only issue I had was the provided mounting screws; they were too short, silver, and will easily strip the head if you try to mount into a stud. I used 2" square-drive deck screws (black) for better results.
customer_reviews.author: 5280 Busa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy padded hooks
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy padded hooks. Only nitpick is that the screws and drywall mounts it ships with are a little bit on the small side depending on how heavy what you're hanging is. My rifle is fairly heavy so I just used some 2" T25 decking screws and fastened the hooks directly to the studs. Overall solid, but it loses a star for the questionably sized screws and mounts it ships with.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Strong and good value but needs more or better covering
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for my application, easy to install and it holds on the wall but the cheap taped on foam is off center and really doesn't fully protect your rifle. It can still hit or rub the corners and the foam is poorly glued on. Would be better to have a mold on soft rubber boot.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy hangers that gave me what I wanted. In my opinion, they look a lot better spaced closer together and completely level, instead of different heights and holding the gun at the barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good product and recommended
customer_reviews.text: Was received quickly. I like the padding to protect the gun. One of the hangers had chips in it where the finish was removed. I used a black marker to cover this up. I would have given 5 stars if the chips were not in it. I was surprised the screws that were included were not black to match the hangers, although I used a screw-in style drywall anchor which worked better. Overall a good product. Strong and will easily hold the weight of a heavy gun.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Family

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time with the cheap crap it comes with
customer_reviews.text: The hangers themselves get five stars, but the included hardware is a joke. Very cheap: buy your own screws and anchors. Don't waste your time with the cheap crap it comes with, you'll just end up ruining your wall. I used better anchors and screws and am pleased with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price, functionality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect price, functionality, and construction. Holds my Mossberg 835 perfectly. Hooks actually look really nice on the wall. They don't look like cheap off brand somethings you buy from a hardware store. Don't miss out on the fact that they have nice foam on them keeping your gun from being scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good value hangers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hanger, and if you choose it I would just recommend you get the same number as the items you wish to hang so they match. That is what I would have done if I could start from scratch. This is the first time I have tried storing rifles this way, and it does require more dusting, but I think they make for a nice wall decoration.
customer_reviews.author: M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I needed a place to hang my S&W M&P 15. I didn't want it sitting in the corner, and I didn't want to hide it away in the closet when I'm home. This fit the bill nicely. When I'm not working, my rifle sits here. Within easy reach, should I need it. IF you have children in the home, you might want something else, unless you can place this behind a locked door.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great Rifle Hooks ! Well Made and a Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have learned that Amazon reviews always have a small group that post nothing but negativity. They would probably complain winning the Lotto because they had to drive to pick up the cash! Lol. These Hooks are great. Took me less than 10 minutes to install. Depending on the weight of your Firearm, I recommend picking up 4 "screw-in" type drywall anchors. They are rated @ 35 lbs. each and then use the 4 screws included in the hardware kit. The rubber padding is great and is not coming off and I couldn't care less that the screw holes are not beveled and recessed. You can't go wrong with these. Great value and as always, fast Amazon shipping.
customer_reviews.author: BLG

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the hooks were of not good quality and were rusty
customer_reviews.author: gunner wermer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Looks as described and it is everything that they described. Great product I am a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Fits decor
customer_reviews.text: Not the fanciest brackets but serve the purpose for holding our two antique wall hanging long guns. They work well with the whole wall collection of antique tools and gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: James Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to mount our AR. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for hanging my grandfather’s double barrel shotgun. Hooks were wide enough...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for hanging my grandfather’s double barrel shotgun. Hooks were wide enough to hold both barrels.
customer_reviews.author: David V.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, I suggest using your own screws and find a stud.
customer_reviews.text: The negative reviews made me wary but for the cheap price I figured id give it a shot. Works perfectly and for those complaining, maybe learn some basic skills and they will hang correctly for you too! The mounting hardware included was a bit junky but nothing an every day tool kit wont solve.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: great gun mounts.
customer_reviews.text: this is for my octagon barrel, .22 caliber lever action rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Giovani Montrose

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. I had a custom gun rack built for my husband and these worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Diane McCallister

customer_reviews.title: Mounting them was easy. Rubberized lining is a plus and will prevent ...
customer_reviews.text: Used these to hang a shotgun on the side bed rail instead of having it propped in a corner. Mounting them was easy. Rubberized lining is a plus and will prevent marring.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Weston

customer_reviews.title: Good shotgun hooks.
customer_reviews.text: Liked that my Remington 870 express fot on it without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t worry about studs or any of that. Worked just fine for my shotgun!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Davies

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I’m using them for my shotgun and honestly they are perfect. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Leena

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are good quality. You might have to re-stick the padding but thats no big deal. The hooks are wide enough for an Ar-15 with a standard handguard. Before i bought these i bought some cheaper hooks and they didnt fit my ar's. Im glad i went with these!
customer_reviews.author: Andres C.

customer_reviews.title: Love for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Simple gun hanging rack. We used for our sons airsoft rifle and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: alirds

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are very durable and strong. As I used these to hang my m14 rifle. Who recommend these for those looking to hang their rifle, shotgun, etc. I would definitely buy these again if I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Julian B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Hung one of my AR's with these. Worked as described.
customer_reviews.author: GTT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my shotgun!
customer_reviews.text: item is small, lightweight and just what i needed in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I actually used one to hang my daughters baby tub ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually used one to hang my daughters baby tub on and the other holds my headset for my PS4
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, simple, affordable
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these placed in the house, they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Zach Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Theyll do the job i guess
customer_reviews.text: Felt wasn't cut evenly. Hooks weren't bent the same. I feel bad putting down someone's work but they just aren't worth 8 bucks.. they'll do what they're supposed to do I suppose
customer_reviews.author: Lamitude

customer_reviews.title: 1890 shotgun
customer_reviews.text: Holds my 1980’s double barrel just fine with two small screws on each bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lawton Rink

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy hooks. Used to hang rifle on stone fireplace ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy hooks. Used to hang rifle on stone fireplace over the mantle. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Kaler

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, and well
customer_reviews.text: Great budget way you hang your shotgun, for an affordable price. I have always thought the gun is the centerpiece, not the rack. This does a good job of showing it off and staying out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Could easily be made yourself but probably not worth the trip ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple but effective. Could easily be made yourself but probably not worth the trip to the store and the time browsing isles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are strong and easy to use. I will order more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: James Laskey

customer_reviews.title: I hate cats
customer_reviews.text: Hung a shotgun above my front door. That way it’s easier to pepper the feral cats in my area.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Good for your shotgun.
customer_reviews.text: I hang my shotgun up out of sight on these. They are sturdy. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: also looks good on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my rifles out of reach from children, also looks good on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: They are chinsy. Not worth the cost. The foam began to peel off almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dog

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Versatile Hooks...
customer_reviews.text: Solid Hooks... surprisingly versatile. A little frustrated that the decent no mar material wasn't fixed well to the hooks. Arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: KBC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised in every respect. It holds an old "decorative" side by side perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: WindyHillWoman

customer_reviews.title: exactly what was promised
customer_reviews.text: came on time and worked perfect for my project. Will have to order more.
customer_reviews.author: james w choate

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: Cheap misleading product. Thought they would be made better. The little foam grip pieces at the bottom are garbage. Not even cut straight or aligned at all with the metal. You could go to Home Depot or ace and get hooks like these no problem.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sipped timely & well wrapped. Did exactly what I expected. The padded J books are a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They hold the interpreter (my shotgun) very well on my wall! It’s ready to fight!
customer_reviews.author: Stickman76

customer_reviews.title: Cool Hook
customer_reviews.text: Holds my smith & wesson sports 2 AR15 just fine... The hooks seems to be sturdy. Price was cheap and afforable.. Check out my picture to see for yourself. The rubber piece was wobbly but it diddt bother me or my rifle...
customer_reviews.author: Tai

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I thought great buy for the money! Nice Hooks and I think I received next day! WOW!
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple hooks that hold my rifle plus i like the padded part to prevent the rifle from been scratch
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my gun rack.
customer_reviews.text: I made a diamond plate gun rack and screwed these on for the hangers. They are perfect for this gun rack. If I ever have the need for another gun rack I'll buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: WaltA

customer_reviews.title: Works great. no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Great value in rifle hangers. Padded in the inside. Works great
customer_reviews.author: DDC

customer_reviews.title: Good protection inside hook for your
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy but strong and attractive in its simplicity. Good protection inside hook for your weapon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely priced little item fir shotgun to hold. Inexpensive and easy to put it. Supports weapon well.

customer_reviews.title: They have a pad glued to the surface for protection of your firearm.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are exactly as advertised. They sturdy and well made.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, worth the money to mount my rifle on the wall and support American jobs.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Sturdy hooks with sort of a plastic liner.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine to display my cap lock. Never will shoot it but good for display.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom and she's liking them so far. If things change I will update.

customer_reviews.title: Grips fell off
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the package the grips came off, could be because of the Texas heat but an easy fix once on the wall they work and do what they were made for

customer_reviews.title: great product, only issue is glue holding rubber pads ...
customer_reviews.text: great product,only issue is glue holding rubber pads had to be re glued
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Mounted to the studs with 3 inch wood screws and it's perfect. Strong, sturdy, and holds my gun snug to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: not beveled like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Not felt, rubbery dip instead. Screw holes are flat, not beveled like the photo, and use washers instead. Poor adhesive as one user noted, the rubber just wants to slide off.
customer_reviews.author: rsdc

customer_reviews.title: Gun rack mounting hooks.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and a complete kit with mounting screws and anchors for masonry mounting. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: GEOFFREY E BLUME SR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and nice design! Super practical, and it's usable with just about any style of man cave.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel v D

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The foam looks like a 5 year old tore them to length and stuck them on wherever they wanted to. They were all different. The screws were not painted. They were packaged in a zip lock bag and loosely thrown into a box with hardly any packing material. The arrived all chipped up from banging against each other. I will have to sand them, re-paint them, and apply new foam to meet my satisfaction. I will also have to paint the screw heads to make it decent looking.
customer_reviews.author: Hetz

customer_reviews.title: Glue is not the best obviously. I just reglued them and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Pads fell off as soon as i was done mounting it. Glue is not the best obviously. I just reglued them and it is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Treissa Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes it’s a good buy. Just like I imagined it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the cushion liner is shifting a bit due to the pressure of the rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Elenz-Martin

customer_reviews.title: despite the negative reviews about the rubbery material slipping and falling off so easily, to mount a
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these, despite the negative reviews about the rubbery material slipping and falling off so easily, to mount a.22 rifle in the back of my FJ cruiser. After seeing them first hand I think they are more suitable for hanging an extension cord or garden tools in a shed or garage. Decided to use a rubber quick fist product to mount the rifle. If you are mounting a rifle decoratively in a house or something they may work great. I wouldn't recommend them for a vehicle application.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W Kern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used these to display two antique rifles, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: and they look good on the
customer_reviews.text: Fit 20 Ga pump perfectly, and they look good on the wall
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I deducted 1 star because there was a hole torn in the plastic bag and the screws and drywall anchors all fell in the floor but luckily I was able to find them all. Took less than 15 minutes for me and my brother to put it up. It's quite sturdy and is made fairly well. Holds up my shotgun and sling with 15 extra rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Tankesly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product holds my Benelli very nicely like the foam on hooks great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its fits about anywheres and it holds my shot gun just right

customer_reviews.title: Not felt lined
customer_reviews.text: It was not felt lined...it was a hard plastic...I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Momtofive24/7

customer_reviews.title: not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The hooks came as packaged, however the quality was not what I expected. The glue on 2 of the 4 rubber coating on the hooks came off as soon as I opened the packages. I had to re-glue the protective rubber onto the hooks. The screws and washers did not appear to be high grade, nor did they come with what size to drill the holes in order to put the anchors in. Ultimately the hooks are up, my Enfield rifles are hung over my grandfather's shadow box, and I'm hoping they hold....
customer_reviews.author: N&L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works for super soaker water guns, xbox video game guns, and muskets. Keep real guns in a safe.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used these to mount on rails of Kawasaki mule worked out great I bungee cord gun down also

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is what it looks sent bolts to hang and all other hardware
customer_reviews.author: randy sanchez

customer_reviews.title: holds my single shot 410
customer_reviews.text: I used some 2" drywall screws to mount this because I live in an old house and I doubt the short included screws would make it to the studs. Other than that they mounted in about one minute. I use them to hold an old single shot Springfield 410 on the wall for when something is bothering the animals or garden. I wanted to keep it up high enough where a dog or child can't get to it but easy enough to grab without going to the safe or bedroom. Works great so far it looks like it will hold up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: mrtdrew

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This is great to hang a shotgun on the wall. It works perfectly!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did it's job, as far as the screws, just plastidip those.

product_meta.title: Johnson Brother Gun Rack Shotgun Hooks Rifle Hangers Archery Bow Felt Lined Wall Mount Storage (Handmade in The U.S.A.)
feature_bullets: Mount to any surface - walls, UTV's, hunting blinds, etc
Strong steel construction with soft rubbery coating to protect guns from moisture
Vinyl coated in black Color. Comes fully assembled with 4 mounting screws included
